it.polimi.se2018.model.dice

Class BalancedFactoryDice

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.dice.BalancedFactoryDice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FactoryDice

    public class BalancedFactoryDice
extends java.lang.Object
implements FactoryDice
    Factory Pattern that generate a balanced set of Dice during one game
    Author:
    Luca Genoni

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BalancedFactoryDice(int numberPlayer, int diceWindow, int numberRound)
      Create a Balance Factory with variable number of dice that depend by the number of the round the number of the player in a game and the number that each player need for the game this factory dice also increment the available dice by the 10% needed and adjust the number of the total dice based on the number of the color available

      method to reinsert a die in the factory
      void reset()
      reset the balanced factory as if it was a new one

    • Constructor Detail

      • BalancedFactoryDice

        public BalancedFactoryDice(int numberPlayer,
                           int diceWindow,
                           int numberRound)
        Create a Balance Factory with variable number of dice that depend by the number of the round the number of the player in a game and the number that each player need for the game this factory dice also increment the available dice by the 10% needed and adjust the number of the total dice based on the number of the color available
        Parameters:
        numberPlayer - the number of players in game
        diceWindow - the number of dice that each players needs
        numberRound - the total number of round
